name: Da Boys
description:
DaBoys is a 2D Tower Defense game. Try to hold back an increasing army of communists, dark crimson horses, and a … cat? Can you survive all the levels and score high in endless mode? 

Background

DaBoys was my COVID pastime, and the first ever complete game I have created. I wrote the story, coded the mechanics, with some help, composed the music, and used maplestory simulator to create the sprites! For my first game I wanted to make something special to me so I chose to make a game involving the most important thing in my life at the time, my friend group. I love all these boys as family so it was no question that I created a medium to cement our relationships until the end of time!

Detailed Credits:

Created By: Daniel Boghossian

Music By: Sebastian Lechner and Daniel Boghossian

Sprites By: Francis Malama and Daniel Boghossian
